title: 390: Mom Talk (Making Our Moms Call In!)
itunes:title: 390: Mom Talk (Making Our Moms Call In!)
description:
The Broads are back and chat Jess’ time at Stagecoach with Bachelor Nation, Bekah’s wedding plans with Blake DJing, and some Met Gala - THEN (00:24:00) with Mother’s Day around the corner they answer some personal parenting questions, call their own moms, chat about what they would tell their past “new mom” selves, the impact of stepmoms/parenting figures, parenting styles, they do a lot of crying - and much more!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***TALKSPACE: Go to TALKSPACE.COM and use code CHATTY to get $100 off your first month!

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box! 

***NATIVE: Go to NAITIVEDEO.COM/CHATTY or use code CHATTY at checkout to get 20% off your first order!

***CARE/OF: Go to TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50 to get 50% off your first Care/of order!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
